author: andschwa
body: Corresponds to 1218e29752ba4 @vors I took a format-patch of the two commits in your source-depot branch. For the binary file I just took a checkout from the HEAD of the source-depot branch. This commit is just an application of the changes. I think this avoids any issues with orphan branches or reverting. --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/powershell/powershell/825)

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Blah xUnit is now dieing, I'll need to disable it until CLI has fixed it.

comments.author: vors
comments.body:
Great, I love it!
To keep tab on things, let's start use **tags** in the form `SD-xxxxxx` on the commits, where we apply such patches. What do you think?

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Yes I agree. I'll get this rebased and tags setup ~~tonight~~ tomorrow.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Okay I have tags. Let me merge and then push tags.

title: Update files from psl-monad source-depot [SD:695331]
